name: Naev
description: Naev is a game about space exploration, trade and combat. Players travel the galaxy and earn money by trading, fighting and performing missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Pentium III class processor or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.1 or later compatible video card Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: None or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Pentium IV class processor or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI r3xx or equivalent Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: None or better
